panel.title: Current Snapshot: Bucket Count by State

input.label: Host
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup fb_hostname_index_cache | dedup orig_host | sort orig_host

table.searchString: | rest /services/data/indexes-extended splunk_server=$host$ | fillnull value=0 bucket_dirs.home.hot_bucket_count, bucket_dirs.home.warm_bucket_count, bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_count, bucket_dirs.thawed.bucket_count | table title, bucket_dirs.home.hot_bucket_count, bucket_dirs.home.warm_bucket_count, bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_count, bucket_dirs.thawed.bucket_count | rename title AS Index bucket_dirs.home.hot_bucket_count AS "Hot Buckets" bucket_dirs.home.warm_bucket_count AS "Warm Buckets" bucket_dirs.cold.bucket_count AS "Cold Buckets" bucket_dirs.thawed.bucket_count AS "Thawed Buckets"
